(mestercipo_logger_led.txt)
(OKW B7005107)
(cmd line: -i mestercipo_logger_led.txt -t)
(szerszám beállítás)

t1 m d2 h19

movz1.5
maxz2

yxz
t1
s50
f900

safetop0.20
safebottom0.20
overcut0.300


pre_mill_steps2

#max meredekség polikarbonát 0.05/100mm
emax0.02

fmax900
fmin700
fratio0.8

z1 = 3

c3 = 0.150
c5 = 0.250 #keret

x = 72.15
y = 20
z = -2.9

h = 5
d = 3
j = 0.2

offset1,1,0

h $x,$y,$z z$z1 c$c3 d$d jg$j

y = add($y,$h)
h $x,$y,$z z$z1 c$c3 d$d jg$j

y = add($y,$h)
h $x,$y,$z z$z1 c$c3 d$d jg$j

y = add($y,$h)
h $x,$y,$z z$z1 c$c3 d$d jg$j
